thread.title: The time is now: Jordan Ayew desperately needs a goal
thread.title_full: The time is now: Jordan Ayew desperately needs a goal

title: The time is now: Jordan Ayew desperately needs a goal
text:
13:40 CET The time is now: Jordan Ayew desperately needs a goal - www.allsports.com.gh 
If there's one man who desperately needs a goal on this international break to boost his spirits it's Aston Villa forward Jordan Ayew. 
The Ghanaian, signed for Â£8.5million this summer, has struggled to make an impact in the opening two months of the season and has yet to register a single goal for his club. play
